segments.text: I notice how calm everything seems outside the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden looks so tidy, so organized, contrasting sharply with this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I almost want to escape to that peaceful space beyond the glass.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, here I am, watching the water overflow wildly inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman doesn’t even flinch as the puddle grows larger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She is completely consumed by her task, perhaps oblivious to the world outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s struggle to reach the cookie jar is a mix of bravery and folly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl, with that look of anticipation, melts my heart.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how naive they seem, completely unaware of the risk they’re in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's all so innocent, yet fraught with danger, and that dichotomy is stunning.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the outside world represents everything they don’t understand yet.
segments.speaker: PAR
